description.value: An antitoxin membrane consists of a colony of nanobots that operate on the molecular level to counter certain toxins. An antitoxin membrane provides a +4 circumstance bonus to saving throws against contact and injury @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.gBhZDjh30JEyh7DY]{Diseases} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Poisons}.
